redirection.title: You are already registered
redirection.body: You can start logging in with your ID {id} or the registered email in a few seconds.

confirmation.title: We have sent you an email
confirmation.subtitle: Check your email and click on the confirmation link or use the confirmation code.
confirmation.emailSent: We have sent a confirmation to the following email:

code.title: Enter your confirmation code
code.body: Enter the code provided to your email.
code.sent: We have sent the code to the following email:

step1.title: Identification
step1.subtitle: User ID
step1.description: This is the first step to verify your identity and create your citizen account.
step1.cedulaTooltip: To start the process of validating your identity, your ID number is necessary.

step2.title: Verification
step2.subtitle: Life proof
step2.description: Next, we will validate your identity through facial verification and life test. Make sure to meet the following conditions:
step2.unavailable: Sorry! We are unable to validate your identity at the moment. Please try again later.
step2.camera: Use a device that has an integrated front camera.
step2.face: Allow us to take captures of your face.
step2.photosensitivity: This verification displays colored lights. Be careful if you are photosensitive.

step3.title: Registration
step3.subtitle: User account
step3.completeForm: To complete your registration, fill in the following fields:

bug.title: Send us your feedback!
bug.name: Name
bug.sent: Sent. Thank you for your feedback!

cedula.invalid: It seems you have entered an invalid ID number.
cedula.exists: This ID has already been registered.

password.validation: It seems there has been an error trying to validate your password, please try again later.

registration.flow: Oops! An error has occurred, please try again later.

errors.unknown: An unexpected error has occurred, please try again later.

liveness.noMatch: We could not validate your identity with the JCE. Try again or update your photo at the JCE.
liveness.lowConfidence: The life test has not been successful. Check the instructions and try again.

recaptcha.issues: It seems the reCaptcha has not correctly validated your request, refresh and try again
recaptcha.validation: We cannot validate the security of your browser, check for pending updates or try with another device.

code.badUrl: The code link is incorrect or has expired.
code.wrong: The code is incorrect or has expired.

errors.createIdentity: An error occurred trying to create the citizen account. Please, try again later.

terms.check: To continue, you must read and accept the terms and privacy policies.

minSpecifications.heading: The camera does not meet the minimum specifications
minSpecifications.message: The camera must support a resolution of at least 320 * 240 and 15 frames per second.

notFound.heading: Camera not accessible
notFound.message: Check that the camera is connected and that camera permissions are enabled in the settings before trying again.

error.signature: Signature has expired. Please verify your system's time settings and attempt again.

timeout.heading: Time's up
timeout.message: The face did not fill the oval within the time limit. Try again and completely fill the oval with your face in 7 seconds.

faceDistance.heading: Face movement detected
faceDistance.message: Avoid getting closer during the connection.

multipleFaces.heading: Multiple faces detected
multipleFaces.message: Only one face should be present in the oval.

client.heading: Client error
client.message: Verification failed due to a client problem

server.heading: Server issue
server.message: Verification cannot be completed due to a server problem

landscape.heading: Landscape orientation not supported
landscape.message: Rotate your device to vertical orientation (portrait).

error.portrait: Make sure your device remains in vertical orientation (portrait) during verification.

hints.centerFaceInstructionText: Instruction: Before starting the check, make sure your camera is at the center top of your screen and center your face to the camera. When the check starts an oval will show up in the center. You will be prompted to move forward into the oval and then prompted to hold still. After holding still for a few seconds, you should hear check complete.
hints.faceOffCenterText: Face is not in the oval, center your face to the camera.
hints.moveFaceFrontOfCamera: Position your face in front of the camera
hints.tooManyFaces: Make sure only one face is in front of the camera
hints.canNotIdentify: We cannot identify your face in front of the camera

header.heading: Facial verification
header.body: You are now going to undergo a facial verification process to prove you are a real person.

photosensitivityWarning.label: Photosensitivity LABEL
photosensitivityWarning.heading: Photosensitivity alert
photosensitivityWarning.body: This verification displays colored lights. Be careful if you are photosensitive.
photosensitivityWarning.info: A small percentage of people may experience epileptic seizures when exposed to colored lights. Be careful if you or someone in your family has any epileptic condition.

list.heading: Follow the instructions to complete the verification:
list.stepOne: When the oval appears, fill it with your face in 7 seconds.
list.stepTwo: Maximize the brightness of your screen.
list.stepThree: Make sure your face is not covered with sunglasses or a mask.
list.stepFour: Move to a well-lit place that is not exposed to direct sunlight.

goodFit.caption: Well fitted
goodFit.alt: Illustration of a person's face, fitting perfectly within an oval.

tooFar.caption: Too far
tooFar.alt: Illustration of a person's face within an oval; there is space between the perimeter of the face and the boundaries of the oval.

registered.header: Congratulations {name}, your Cuenta Única has been successfully created!
registered.body: Now your ID {id} is the key to access government websites and applications with just one account and password.
registered.capabilities: From now on, you can access:

descriptions.gobdo: To consult and carry out procedures or services from the comfort of your home.
descriptions.soyyo: Where you will have all your data in one place.
descriptions.becas: For educational credit and scholarship applications.

cedula.min: The ID must contain at least 11 digits
cedula.max: The ID must contain a maximum of 11 digits

code.min: The code must contain at least 6 digits
code.max: The code must contain a maximum of 6 digits

password.minimum: The Password must contain at least 10 characters.
password.emailSimilarity: The Password cannot contain parts of your Email
password.cedulaSimilarity: The Password cannot contain parts of your ID

warnings.breachedPassword: This password has been in data breaches, so it is not considered safe. We recommend you choose another password.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.helpText: Please verify that the link is correct and that all required parameters are present.
